69.movie_plot: A simple man is turned into a genius through the application of computer science.

31.movie_plot: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

35.movie_name: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home (1986)

7.movie_plot: A video game based on Terminator 2: Judgment Day (1991).

53.movie_name: Adventures of Buckaroo Bonzai Across the 8th Dimension, The (1984)
53.movie_plot: Adventurer, brain surgeon, rock musician Buckaroo Banzai and his crime-fighting team, the Hong Kong Cavaliers, must stop evil alien invaders from the eighth dimension who are planning to conquer Earth.

11.movie_name: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country (1991)

46.movie_plot: Charlie receives a golden ticket to a factory, his sweet tooth wants going into the lushing candy, it turns out there's an adventure in everything.

39.movie_plot: Disturbed Blanche DuBois moves in with her sister in New Orleans and is tormented by her brutish brother-in-law while her reality crumbles around her.

57.movie_plot: The two best hired guns in the West must save President Grant from the clutches of a nineteenth-century inventor-villain.

36.movie_plot: Humanity finds a mysterious, obviously artificial object buried beneath the Lunar surface and, with the intelligent computer H.A.L. 9000, sets off on a quest.
